content: Click Open <1>{{organizationName}} Desktop</1> in the browser dialog to work with the encrypted documents.

comment.text: This translation key is used for a button label that displays instructions on how to open an encrypted document from the browser dialog. It appears in the Private Rooms Page and should be translated to facilitate understanding of this feature.

usage.context:
</Text>
 
 <Text as="div" textAlign="center" fontSize="20px" fontWeight={300}>
 <Trans
 t={t}
 i18nKey="PrivacyClick"
 ns="PrivacyPage"
 values={{
 organizationName: logoText,
 }}
 components={{

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The opening and closing tags for `organizationName` are not correctly matched with the English content. The English uses `<1>{{organizationName}}</1>`, while the Arabic uses `<1>{{organizationName}}</1>`. The closing tag should be corrected to `</1>`.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: انقر فوق فتح <1>{{organizationName}}</1> في مربع الحوار المتصفح للعمل مع المستندات المشفرة.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Click Open" is not accurately translated. "Click Open" implies an action to initiate something, which is not conveyed in the Azerbaijani translation of just "düyməsini klikləyin". A better translation would include an action word like 'Açmaq' (to open).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Şifrələnmiş sənədlərlə işləmək üçün brauzer dialoqunda <1> {{organizationName}} Desktop </1> -ı açın düyməsini klikləyin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Azerbaijani translation doesn't maintain the formatting of the English content.  The opening and closing `<1>` tags should remain consistent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure the tags `<1>` and `</1>` enclose the entire '{{organizationName}} Desktop' phrase identically to the English version.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The verb 'работиш' (rabotish - you work) implies direct action by the user. A more appropriate verb would be 'можеш да работиш' (mozes da rabotish - you can work) or 'за да използваш' (za da izpolzvash - in order to use), as the action is enabled by opening the Desktop application.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Натисни Отвори <1>{{organizationName}} Desktop</1> в диалога на браузъра, за да можеш да работиш с криптирани документи.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The tags <1>{{organizationName}}</1> are not correctly closed in the Czech translation. It should be </1>.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Klikněte na Otevřít <1>{{organizationName}}</1> v dialogovém okně prohlížeče a pracujte se zašifrovanými dokumenty.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Click Open <1>{{organizationName}} Desktop</1>" is translated as "Klicken Sie auf <1>{{organizationName}} Desktop Editoren</1>". 'Editoren' (Editors) doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Desktop' in this context. It implies a team of editors, not the desktop application itself.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Klicken Sie auf <1>{{organizationName}} Desktop</1> öffnen in der Dialogbox...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure "Klicken Sie auf <1>{{organizationName}} Desktop Editoren</1> öffnen in der Dialogbox..." is grammatically awkward. The verb 'öffnen' is awkwardly positioned.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Klicken Sie in der Dialogbox auf <1>{{organizationName}} Desktop</1> zum Öffnen...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the XML tags are preserved, the flow of the sentence could be improved by reordering elements to better suit German sentence structure.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider restructuring the sentence to improve readability. For example: 'Klicken Sie in der Dialogbox auf <1>{{organizationName}} Desktop</1>, um mit verschlüsselten Dokumenten zu arbeiten.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The `<1>{{organizationName}}</1>` tags are not properly closed in the Greek translation. They are closed with `</1>` instead of `</1>`. This should match the English formatting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Κάντε κλικ στην επιλογή Άνοιγμα <1>{{organizationName}}</1> στο παράθυρο διαλόγου του προγράμματος περιήγησης για να εργαστείτε με τα κρυπτογραφημένα έγγραφα.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Click Open' is not accurately translated. 'Haga clic en Abrir' is a literal translation but sounds awkward in Spanish. A more natural phrasing would be 'Pulse Abrir' or 'Seleccione Abrir'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pulse Abrir

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Click Open' is not accurately translated. 'Napsauta' is correct for 'Click', but 'Avaa' simply means 'Open'. A more natural Finnish translation for 'Open' in this context would be something like 'Käynnistä' (Launch) or 'Avaa...'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Napsauta Käynnistä <1>{{organizationName}} Desktop</1>...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Click Open' is translated as 'Cliquez sur Ouvrir'. While technically correct, it's slightly awkward in French. A more natural translation would be 'Cliquez sur l'ouverture de...'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Cliquez sur l'ouverture de <1>{{organizationName}} Desktop</1>

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "Desktop" as "Սեղան" is too literal. "Desktop" in this context refers to a web-based desktop environment, not a physical table. A more accurate translation would be something along the lines of "աշխատասեղանի միջավայր" or "աշխատանքային տարածք".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Սեղմել՝բացել <1>{{organizationName}} աշխատասեղանի միջավայր</1> Զննիչի երկխոսության մեջ՝ գաղտնագրված փաստաթղթերի հետ աշխատելու համար:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian text uses a space before the `<1>` tag, which might be a formatting issue depending on the rendering environment. It's best to have consistent spacing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the space before the `<1>` tag for consistency.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Click Open" is awkwardly translated as "開くをクリックします". A more natural translation would be "を開く" or simply "開く".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 暗号化されたドキュメントを操作するために、ブラウザのダイアログで<1>{{organizationName}} デスクトップ</1> を開くをクリックします。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The angle brackets around '{{organizationName}} Desktop' are not consistently applied. The English content uses '<1>{{organizationName}} Desktop</1>', while the Korean translation uses a different format.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Maintain consistency in the angle bracket formatting. Use '<1>{{organizationName}} Desktop</1>' in the Korean translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation maintains the `<1>` and `</1>` tags from the English content. These tags should be removed or adapted to the Lao formatting conventions for similar markup if applicable, but are likely unnecessary in the final rendered text.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the `<1>` and `</1>` tags from the Lao translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'ກົດເປີດ' is a valid translation for 'Click Open', it might be more natural to use a phrase like 'ເລືອກເປີດ' or 'ບິດເປີດ' depending on the context and desired tone. 'ກົດເປີດ' feels slightly more literal and less idiomatic.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'ເລືອກເປີດ' or 'ບິດເປີດ' instead of 'ກົດເປີດ'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "browser dialog" is translated as "browservenster". While technically correct, "dialoogvenster" would be a more natural and commonly used translation for "dialog" in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Klik Open <1>{{organizationName}} Desktop</1> in het dialoogvenster om met de versleutelde documenten te werken.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Click Open' is not accurately translated. 'Click Open' implies a direct action. A more natural Portuguese translation would be 'Clique para abrir' or 'Abrir'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Clique para abrir

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ca să puteți lucra" is overly verbose and sounds unnatural in Romanian. A more direct and natural translation of 'to work with' would be 'pentru a lucra cu'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Faceți clic pe Deschidere <1>{{organizationName}} Desktop</1> din fereastra de dialog a browserului pentru a lucra cu documentele criptate.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Faceți clic" is grammatically correct, a more natural and common phrase for 'Click' in this context would be 'Dați clic'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dați clic pe Deschidere <1>{{organizationName}} Desktop</1> din fereastra de dialog a browserului pentru a lucra cu documentele criptate.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "Editors" in the Russian translation ("Editors") doesn't perfectly align with "Desktop" in the English version. While "Editors" is understandable, it implies a focus on editing rather than the application itself. A more accurate translation might be something like "Рабочий стол" (Rabochiy stol) or "Приложение" (Prilozhenie) depending on the context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing "Editors" with "Рабочий стол" or "Приложение" for a more accurate representation of "Desktop".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The original English uses "<1>{{organizationName}} Desktop</1>". The Russian translation follows the same formatting, but its appropriateness might be questionable. The Russian language often uses different formatting conventions.  The use of <1> tags isn’t standard in Russian technical documentation and can hinder readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider removing the `<1>` tags in the Russian translation and integrating the organization name more naturally into the sentence. For example:  "Нажмите Открыть {{organizationName}} Рабочий стол в диалоговом окне браузера..." or "Нажмите Открыть приложение {{organizationName}} в диалоговом окне браузера..."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Sinhala translation retains the HTML tags `<1>{{organizationName}} Desktop</1>` which is unnecessary in the target language and disrupts readability. These tags should be removed and the text should be incorporated naturally into the sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: බ්‍රවුසර සංවාදයේ {{organizationName}} Desktop ක්ලික් කරන්න, එන්ක්‍රිප්ට් කරන ලද ලේඛන සමඟ වැඩ කිරීම සඳහා.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Desktop' is not explicitly translated in the Sinhala version. While not always necessary, depending on the context, translating it might improve clarity for Sinhala speakers. A possible translation would be 'ලේඛන තිරය' (lekahana thiraya - document screen).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: බ්‍රවුසර සංවාදයේ {{organizationName}} Desktop (ලේඛන තිරය) ක්ලික් කරන්න, එන්ක්‍රිප්ට් කරන ලද ලේඛන සමඟ වැඩ කිරීම සඳහා.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The original English content uses angle brackets around `{{organizationName}} Desktop`. The Slovak translation maintains the angle brackets around only 'položku', not around the entire phrase '{{organizationName}} Desktop'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ak chcete pracovať so šifrovanými dokumentmi, kliknite v dialógovom okne prehliadača na položku Otvoriť <1>{{organizationName}} Desktop</1>.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'namizja' (desktop) is a genitive case. It should be in nominative case, 'namizje', to agree with 'odprtje'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Klikni za odprtje <1>{{organizationName}} namizje</1> v pogovornem oknu brskalnika za delo s šifriranimi dokumenti.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Click Open" is not accurately translated to "Кликните на Отвори". "Open" implies a command, and a more accurate translation would be "Отвори" which translates to "Open" or "Launch".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Кликните на 'Отвори' or Кликните за да отворите

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English "Desktop Editors" is not the correct translation. "Desktop" typically refers to the entire desktop environment. It seems "Desktop" is being used to refer to an application.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Кликните на <1>{{organizationName}} Desktop</1>

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The tags `<1>{{organizationName}} Desktop</1>` are not correctly rendered in the Serbian translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure the tags are correctly implemented in the translation system, mirroring the English version precisely.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Otvori' translates to 'Open', but should ideally be 'Pokreni' for 'Launch' or 'Start' when referring to a desktop application. 'Otvori' implies opening a file or document, not launching an application.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pokrenite <1>{{organizationName}} Desktop</1> u dijalogu pregledača da biste radili sa šifrovanim dokumentima.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The tags <1> and </1> are replicated in both the English and Serbian translations. It's crucial to ensure consistency. While not a severe error, maintaining this consistency is important for localization workflows.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Review and confirm that the tags <1> and </1> are intentionally mirrored and serve a specific purpose in the localization process. If not, they should be removed or adjusted in both versions.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The opening tag `<1>{{organizationName}} Desktop</1>` in the English content is not consistently translated in the Turkish translation. While the closing tag `</1>` is present, the opening tag should also be consistent. The English uses 'Click Open', the Turkish uses 'Aç'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Şifrelenmiş belgelerle çalışmak için tarayıcı iletişim kutusunda 'Click Open' <1>{{organizationName}} Desktop</1> tıklayın.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Click' is not explicitly translated. It is implied by the imperative verb, but directly translating it improves clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Şifrelenmiş belgelerle çalışmak için tarayıcı iletişim kutusunda 'Tıklayın' <1>{{organizationName}} Desktop</1> açın.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "Click Open" is awkward. "Клацніть" is correct for 'Click', but "Відкрити" doesn't quite capture the nuance of 'Open' in this context. It's technically correct but could be improved for a more natural flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Клацніть "Відкрити <1>Робочий стіл {{organizationName}}</1>...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The space after the opening quote mark in the Ukrainian translation is incorrect. It should be without a space.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Клацніть "Відкрити<1>...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "cho Máy tính" literally translates to "for Computer" which is not idiomatic in this context. It should convey the meaning of 'Desktop'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nhấp mở <1>{{organizationName}} Desktop</1> trong hộp thoại trình duyệt để làm việc với các tài liệu được mã hóa.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The bracketed tags <1> and </1> are not properly rendered in the Chinese translation. They should mirror the English format.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 在浏览器中点击打开<1>{{organizationName}}桌面版</1>以处理加密文档

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “Desktop版” while technically correct, might be too literal. A more natural phrasing for a desktop application could be used.  The implied meaning of 'work with' might be lost in translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 在浏览器中点击打开<1>{{organizationName}}桌面应用</1>以处理加密文档
